text: yahee hain, jinake lie sthaayee svarg hain, jinamen naharen pravaahit hain, usamen unhen sone ke kangan pahanaaye jaayenge.[1] tatha (ve) maheen aur gaadhe resham ke hare vastr pahanenge, usamen sinhaasanon ke oopar aaseen honge. ye kya hee achchha pratiphal aur kya hee achchha vishraam sthaan hai
